training_captions: UWB printed monopole with a spanner-shaped patch fed by a 50-Ω microstrip above a truncated ground; linear polarization, near-omnidirectional pattern, and ≈120% fractional bandwidth spanning S/C/X bands.
Wrench-like notched patch radiator on FR-4 with a narrow neck and central slot, edge-fed by an SMA connector; partial ground on the backside broadens the impedance match over 3–10 GHz.
Compact mask-style UWB PCB antenna: a notched polygonal patch and short feed neck deliver linear-pol omni radiation with mid realized gain across an ultra-wide band.
